articles.title: MLB to pay $185 million in settlement with minor league players over minimum-wage and overtime allegations - ESPN
articles.description: MLB will pay $185 million to settle the federal class-action lawsuit filed by minor league players who sought pay for minimum-wage and overtime allegations.
